Welcome to inkmanip’s documentation!¶

Set of tools to manipulate inkscape files.

class inkmanip.inkmanip.inkscapeFile(filePath)¶

Reads inkscape file.

Parameters

filePath (str) – directory path to .svg file

prefix¶

text that initialize .svg file

Type

str

endOfFile¶

text that ends .svg file

Type

str

layers¶

dict.key() is the layer id, dict.value() is the layer itself

Type

dict

label2id¶

dict to convert between inkscape label and layer id

Type

dict

getLayersId()¶

Return a list with layers id’s

getInkLabels()¶

Return a list with inkscape labels

getLayersId()

Return a list with layers id’s.

getInkLabels()

Return a list with inkscape labels.

inkmanip.inkmanip.getInkscapeLabel(string)¶

It looks for the Inkscape Label of a layer, eg, inkscape:label=”Layer 5”. First Label found is returned.

Parameters

string – (string) svg chunk of text

Returns

layer id as a string (return 0 if id not found)

inkmanip.inkmanip.layerTurnOnVisibility(string)¶

Turn on layers visibility. First layer with visibility off is turned on.

Parameters

string – (string) svg chunk of text

inkmanip.inkmanip.exportInkscape_svg(inkscapeFile_object, out_directory=PosixPath('/home/galdino/github/inkmanip/docs'), out_filename='exported', layerList='all')¶

extract layers from inkscape .svg and save in another .svg file

Parameters

  • inkscapeFile_object – inkscapeFile object

  • out_directory – (string or Path object) output directory

  • out_filename – (string) new .svg filename

  • layerList – list of inkscape layer labels as strings

inkmanip.inkmanip.svg2pdf(inkscape_filepath, out_directory=PosixPath('/home/galdino/github/inkmanip/docs'), out_filename='converted.pdf')¶

Converts inkscape .svg file in .pdf

Parameters

  • inkscape_filepath – (string or Path object) .svg file path

  • out_directory – (string or Path object) output directory

  • out_filename – string pdf filename

inkmanip.inkmanip.merger(pdf_path_list, out_directory=PosixPath('/home/galdino/github/inkmanip/docs'), out_filename='merged.pdf')¶

Merge pdf’s.

Parameters

  • pdf_path_list – list of (string or Path object) with all pdf’s to merge (in order)

  • out_directory – (string or Path object) output directory

  • out_filename – string pdf filename
